text.ibo: Ndi isi ndi okperechi na-echi ndi ọhụrụ echichi iji nabata ha n'ozi Chineke.
text.swa: Washiriki wapya wanatawazwa katika huduma na viongozi wakuu wa dini.

text.ach: Peko ma dano too iye ipol kare dwong igudi
text.lgg: Drileonzi wura onzi saaru 'diyi eyi 'ye saaru nzila 'bani ayu saaru 'diyi ma dria
text.lug: Obubenje ddekabusa bungi nnyo ku nguuddo ezikozesebwa ennyo.
text.nyn: Butandu ezirikufeeramu abantu, nizikira kuba aha nguuto.
text.teo: Idilas akangasia nuarokok orotin luapolok.
text.eng: Fatal accidents are common on busy roads.
text.ibo: Ihe mberede nke nwere ike ibute ọnwụ, adịghị ụkọ n'okporo ụzọ na-ekwo ekwo.
text.swa: Katika barabara zenye shughuli nyingi, ajali mbaya hutokea mara kwa mara.

text.ach: Tyelo kor mon kelo dongo lobo
text.lgg: Ba erini tutuni oku eyi ma o'duko ezoanzi eyi pie ku e'yo peta ni 'diyi ma alea
text.lug: Okutumbula abakyala kukubiriza eby'enkulaakulana mu by'enfuna.
text.nyn: Okwongyera abakazi amaani, nikireeta entunguuka.
text.teo: Aitigogong angor itopolori apol.
text.eng: Empowering women encourages economic growth.
text.ibo: Ikwado ụmụnwanyị na-akwalite uto akụ na ụba.
text.swa: Uwezeshaji wa wanawake unakuza upanuzi wa kiuchumi.

text.ach: Dule ma neno lok pa mon tye i Uganda
text.lgg: Ba e'do amuti pa tupi e'yo oku eyini si 'diyi kari Uganda niri ma alea
text.lug: Ebibiina by'abakyala bigunjiddwawo mu Uganda.
text.nyn: Ebibiina by'abakazi, bitandikirweho omu Uganda.
text.teo: Associations nu angor kes etolomun ko Uganda.
text.eng: Women gender associations have been formulated in Uganda.
text.ibo: E nwela otu mkpakọrịta ụmụnwanyị na Uganda
text.swa: Nchini Uganda, vyama kati ya wanawake na jinsia vimeanzishwa.

text.ach: Lutela omyero gulok ki dwon acel
text.lgg: Le drice'ba ongulumu ni 'diyi ma nze e'yo o'duko alu si
text.lug: Abakulembeze b'ekitundu beetaaga okwogera n'eddoboozi limu .
text.nyn: Abeebembezi b'ebyaro, bashemereire kugira eiraka rimwe.
text.teo: Ekot engarenok lu itunga alimor keda ediope eproto.
text.eng: The community leaders need to speak with one voice.
text.ibo: Ndi Isi Obodo kwesịrị iji otu olu na-ekwu okwu.
text.swa: Viongozi katika jamii lazima wawasiliane kama kitu kimoja.

text.ach: Lutic yoto kom gubu kati ki yub me gwero dano i kom two yellow fever
text.lgg: Arakala rua ala ni distrikiti'a ri ni mu otita 'ba eyi osozu azo yellow fever nirisi ni 'ye
text.lug: Ekitongole ky'ebyobulamu ku disitulikiti kijja kugema abantu omusujja gw'enkaka.
text.nyn: Ekitongore ky'eby'amagara ekya Disiturikiti, nikiija kusirika omushwija gw'enkaka.
text.teo: Elosi ewai lo angaleu ko disitrikt aikis ekato loka eimidi loidosoikini akonye.
text.eng: The district health department will carry out a yellow fever vaccination.
text.ibo: Ngalaba na ahu maka ahuike na mpaghara a ga agba ọgwụ mgbochi ọcha na anya.
text.swa: Mpango wa chanjo ya homa ya manjano utasimamiwa na idara ya afya ya wilaya.

text.ach: distrik peke ki lutic yoto kom pi two yellow fever
text.lgg: Distrikiti 'da vu azi'ba e'yo rua ala nisi 'diyi azo yellow fever niri atrizu yo
text.lug: Disitulikiti terina basawo kuziyiza obulwadde bw'omusujja gw'enkaka.
text.nyn: Disiturikiti teine bakozi b'omwirwariro, okuragurira omushwija gw'enkaka.
text.teo: Emamiatatar edisitrikt keda eswamak lu itikitikete yellow fever.
text.eng: The district lacks medical personnel to contain the yellow fever disease.
text.ibo: Ndi mpaghara enweghị ndi ọrụ ahụike iji nwe ike ịnwụchịkọ ọrịa ọcha n'anya a.
text.swa: Hakuna madaktari wa kutosha katika wilaya hiyo kudhibiti mlipuko wa homa ya manjano.

text.ach: Dul me distrik ma neno lok yoto kom otimo kwed i kom two yellow fever
text.lgg: Arakala rua alata ni distrikiti'a ri 'ye e'yo eti ondaza e'dota azo yellow fever niri ni ma dria ra
text.lug: Ekitongole kya disitulikiti eky'ebyobulamu kyakoze okunoonyereza ku kubalukawo kw'omusujja gw'enkaka.
text.nyn: Ekitongore ky'eby'amagara ekya Disiturikiti, kikakora okucondooza ahakubarukaho kw'omushwiija gw'enkaka.
text.teo: Abu ewai lo amukian ko disitrikt itolot aingic nuikamunit abwangun naka eimidi loidosoikini akonye.
text.eng: The district medical department carried out investigations about the yellow fever outbreak.
text.ibo:
Ngalaba ndi ahụike nọ na mpaghara ahụ mere nyocha banyere 
nfesa ọrịa ọcha n'anya.
text.swa: Mlipuko wa homa ya manjano ulichunguzwa na idara ya matibabu ya wilaya.

text.ach: Lwak omyero gutii kacelo ki lutic yoto kom
text.lgg: Le 'ba eyi ma eciti azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi pie
text.lug: Abantu balina okukolagana ne ttiimu y'abasawo.
text.nyn: Abantu bashemereire kukwatanisa n'ab'ebyamagara.
text.teo: Ekot itunga aimorikikin keda eswamak lu adekis.
text.eng: People should cooperate with the medical teams.
text.ibo: Ndi people kwesịrị mmekọta ha na ndi otu ahụike.
text.swa: Umma unapaswa kusaidia wafanyikazi wa matibabu.

text.ach: Lutela me tekwaro lukee dok gitamo pigi kengi
text.lgg: Drice'ba suruni 'diyi anyamgbolo ru azini ikpere ru
text.lug: Abakulembeze b'ennono balina omululu n'okweyagaliza.
text.nyn: Abeebembezi b'eby'obuhangwa, baine omururu, kandi nibeyendeza.
text.teo: Engarenok lu atekerin isinyoko ido ibitioko
text.eng: Cultural leaders are greedy and selfish.
text.ibo: Ndi isi omenala bụ ndi afọ eju eju na ndi ma nanị onwe ya.
text.swa: Wasomi wa kitamaduni ni wachoyo na wabinafsi.

text.ach: Gangi kwan omyero gumi pwod ki lutino ma pe woo
text.lgg: Le sukulu eyi ma fe panga sukulu anzi drionziru 'diyini
text.lug: Amasomero galina okubonereba abayizi  abatalina mpisa.
text.nyn: Amashomero gashemereire kufubira abeegi abaine engyesho mbi.
text.teo: Ekot isomeroi aitisilar idwe lu ediakanarete.
text.eng: Schools should punish indisciplined students.
text.ibo: Ndị ụlọ akwụkwọ kwesịrị ị na-ata ụmụakwụkwọ n'adịghị erube isi, ahụhụ.
text.swa: Wanafunzi wasio na adabu wanapaswa kuwa na nidhamu shuleni.

text.ach: Kibi yero won kom manyen cok coki
text.lgg: Ba nga 'Bili ei o'diru ni pe mbeleru ra
text.lug: Ssentebe omuggya ajja kulondebwa mu bwangu.
text.nyn: Mukuru w'entebe omusya naija kuba yatooranwa juba.
text.teo: Eyapie aseun apolon eicolong loitetet.
text.eng: A new chairperson will soon be elected.
text.ibo: Ọ gaghị adị anya mgbe a ga-ahọpụta onyeisi oche ọhụrụ.
text.swa: Umekaribia wakati wa kumchagua mwenyekiti mpya.

text.ach: Guloko ki abili ni otim itgi kica
text.lgg: Eyi obe azi'ba 'da eyi truzu te
text.lug: Baateesa n'omukungu okubasonyiwa.
text.nyn: Bakateisa na ofiisa ngu amusaasire.
text.teo: Apotu kesi ineranaros keda eswaman kanu aitim kes.
text.eng: They negotiated with the officer to forgive them.
text.ibo: Ha na ndi uweoji kpakọrịtara ụka ka agbahara ya.
text.swa: Walijadiliana kupata msamaha wa afisa huyo.

text.ach: Lutic yot kom gu cike me miyo kony me yot kom bot lwak
text.lgg: Azi'ba azi ngapi e'yo rua ala ni be 'diyi owi eyi azakoma e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi fezu 'ba eyidri
text.lug: Abasawo bali banyiikivu mu kuwa bantu obujjanjabi.
text.nyn: Abashaho bakaba nibafayo munonga okuhisya obuheereza ahabantu
text.teo: Akapakina eswamak lu adekis amukian itunga.
text.eng: The health workers were committed to providing health services to the people.
text.ibo: Ndi ọrụ ahụike kpọrọ ya mkpa ihụ na ha na-enye ndi mmadụ ezi nlekọta.
text.swa: Wataalamu wa afya walijitolea kutoa huduma za afya ya umma.

text.ach: Lunyodo pwonyo lutino gi
text.lgg: Tipika eyi onita fe anzi eyivile 'diyini
text.lug: Abazadde basomesa abaana baabwe.
text.nyn: Abazaire nibegyesa abaana baabo.
text.teo: Itosiomete auriak idwe kec.
text.eng: Parents educate their children.
text.ibo: Nne na nna kwesịrị ikụziri ụmụ ha
text.swa: Wazazi hufundisha watoto wao.

text.ach: Yub me pit eni kibi tiyo kwede pi kare me mwaka abic
text.lgg: Ba nga otita nyaka nyaza muke ri niri 'ba 'yeta ma alea eli towi ma alea
text.lug: Enteekateeka y'ebyendya ennungi ejja kuteekebwa mu nkola mu bbanga lya myaka etaano.
text.nyn: Entekateeka y'eby'endiisa neija kuza omu nkora, omubwire bw'emyaka etaano.
text.teo: Eponio aitegear aitemonokineta nuka enyame kotoma apak na ikaru ikany.
text.eng: The nutritional plan will be implemented in a period of five years.
text.ibo: Imejụpụta atụmatụ banyere oriri na-edozi ahụ, ga-ewe afọ ise.
text.swa: Miaka mitano ambayo mpango wa lishe utaanza kutumika itapita.

text.ach: Bulu mapol gucako cato jami acama
text.lgg: Ba ode karakara eyi e'do curu'do nyaka ozi 'bo
text.lug: Abavubuka bangi batandise okutunda emmere.
text.nyn: Eminyeeto mingi etandikire kuguza eby'okurya.
text.teo: Ageutu atumunak luipu agwelanar inyamat.
text.eng: Many youths have started selling foodstuffs.
text.ibo: Ọtụtụ ndi ntorobịa amalitele ire ihe oriri.
text.swa: Vijana wengi wameanza kuuza chakula.

text.ach: Mon pwod pe kitye ka cung itgi maber itela
text.lgg: Omgbo oku eyini patuzu pari driceza ni 'diyi ma alea ri nga po'di were
text.lug: Abakyala era tebannakiikirirwa bulungi mu bifo by'obukulembeze.
text.nyn: Abakazi n'obwahati tibarikujwekyerwa kurungi omumyanya y'obwebembezi.
text.teo: Eringa angor mam ebwoikitai ejok kaiboisio nuapolok.
text.eng: Women are still unfairly represented in leadership positions.
text.ibo: Ụmụnwanyị enwetachabeghị ezigbo ọnọdụ na-ọkwa ọchịchị.
text.swa: Jinsia ya kike bado haijawakilishwa vizuri katika uongozi.

text.ach: Joo mukene pwod pe gunongo mucara gi
text.lgg: Ba azi eyi esuni nga musara eyivileri ku
text.lug: Abantu abamu tebannafuna musaala gwabwe.
text.nyn: Abantu abamwe tibakatungire omushara gwabo.
text.teo: Mam icie itunga edumunitos eropito kec.
text.eng: Some people have not yet received their salary.
text.ibo: Ụfọdụ ndi mmadụ enwetabeghị ụgwọọnwa ha.
text.swa: Watu wengine hawajapata mishahara bado.

text.ach: Yub eni pe obi tum ikare ki kome
text.lgg: Ba ngani mu otita 'di de sa'wa dria ku
text.lug: Pulojekiti tejja kuggwa mu budde.
text.nyn: Purogyekiti terikuza kuhwa omu bwire obuhikire.
text.teo: Mam epurojekt ngol edaun kotoma apak.
text.eng: The project will not be completed on time.
text.ibo: Agaghị arụcha ọrụ ngo ahụ n'oge.
text.swa: Mradi hautakamilika kwa wakati.

text.ach: Gamente omyero obed ki yub me pwonye pi lutic yoto kom
text.lgg: Le gamete ma otu otita imbatani 'diyi azi'ba e'yo rua alanisi 'diyini
text.lug: Gavumenti eyina okuteekateka okutendekebwa kw'abasawo.
text.nyn: Gavumenti zishemereire kutebekanisa emishomo ya bashaho.
text.teo: Ekot apugan aitemokin ainapeta lu aitutonoro kanu eswamak lu adekis.
text.eng: The government should organise training programs for health workers.
text.ibo: Ndi gọọmenti kwesịrị ịhazi usoro ọmụmụ maka ndi ọrụ ahụike.
text.swa: Serikali inafaa kupanga  programu ya mafunzo kwa wafanyikazi wa afya.

text.ach: inino eni cilam gi poko jami ma gitye kwede ki dano mukene
text.lgg: O'du 'disi, isilamu eyi afa eyivu 'diyi awa eyi ma eselea
text.lug: Ku lunaku luno abasiraamu bagabana akatono konns ke balina n'abalala.
text.nyn: Ahaizooba eri, abasiraamu nibabagana kakye koona aku baine.
text.teo: Kaparan kana emorete isiramun lupe ejaas keda akes
text.eng: On this day Moslems share whatever little they have with each other.
text.ibo: N'ụbọchị a ndi Alakụba na-ekenye ibe ha ihe oriri n'agbanyeghị otu ọbụla ọ ha.
text.swa: Hii siku waislamu hugawana kila kidogo wanacho kwa kila mmoja.

text.ach: Kwo na tye kama ding
text.lgg: Ma edri eyi e'yo alea
text.lug: Obulamu bwange buli mu katyabaga.
text.nyn: Amagara gangye gari omu kabi.
text.teo: Ejai aijar ka ationis.
text.eng: My life is at a risk.
text.ibo: Anọm n'ize ndụ.
text.swa: Maisha yangu yako hatarini.

text.ach: Kabedo peke icuk me tero lucat weng
text.lgg: Pari ca cu ma alea 'ba afa ozipi 'diyi ma tambazu dria ku
text.lug: Tewaliwo kifo mu katale okubeeramu abasuubuzi bonna.
text.nyn: Omukatare tiharimu mwanya, ogurikubaasa kumara abashubuzi boona.
text.teo: Emamei apak kosokoni kanu ayangar agwelanarak kere.
text.eng: There is no space in the market to accommodate all the vendors.
text.ibo: Ohere adịghị n'ahịa ịbatacha ndi nile na-ere ihe.
text.swa: Hakuna nafasi kwa soko ya kuwatosha wachuuzi wote.

text.ach: Pol pa cuk ma i Uganda gi peke ki kabedo me medo dit gi
text.lgg: Cu abari kari Uganda niri ma alea 'diyi ma angu eyini ani eyi edrizu yo
text.lug: Obutale obusinga mu Uganda tebuyina bibangirizi we buyinza kugaziyirizibwa.
text.nyn: Obutare bwingi omu Uganda, tibwine myanya erikumara okubushanjuura.
text.teo: Isokonin luipu ko Uganda emamei apak na ilosikina kanu aitanyanyario.
text.eng: Most of the markets in Uganda lack enough space for expansion.
text.ibo: Ọtụtụ ahịa na Uganda, enweghị ohere zuru oke maka mgbasa.
text.swa: Soko mingi za Uganda zinakosa nafasi ya kutosha kupanuliwa.

text.ach: Tic me pur tek totwal ikare me oro
text.lgg: Agirikica ni eca ewaru angu a'wiru 'diyi ma alea
text.lug: Obulimi n'obulunzi bifuuka kuzibu mu bitundu ebirimu omusana.
text.nyn: Eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa tibyanguhi omu bwire bw'ekyanda.
text.teo: Etionuni akoru aiboisio nu eokitos.
text.eng: Agriculture becomes difficult in dry areas.
text.ibo: Ọrụ ugbo na-ara ahụ n'ala ọkpọọ.
text.swa: Ukulima umekua mgumu katika maeneo makavu.

text.ach: Kilegogi me cwalo adwoki me tic gi bot lutic me distrik
text.lgg: Ba ai eyi kokobi eyini e'yo sizu e'yo i'yepiri ma dria ri fezu azi'ba distrikiti ni 'diyi vu
text.lug: Baagambiddwa okuwaayo alipoota eri abakungu ba disitulikiti.
text.nyn: Bakagambirwa ngu baheereze ripooti omu bakungu ba disiturikiti.
text.teo: Aponi kes olimokinai aijukar eripoti kec nejaas eswamak lu edisitrikt.
text.eng: They were told to submit the report to the district officials.
text.ibo: Agwara ha ka ha nye ndi isi mpaghara, akwụkwọ nchọpụta ha.
text.swa: Waliambiwa wawasilishe repoti kwa viongozi wa wilaya.

text.ach: Gukwano waraga me koko wa
text.lgg: Ba la ama waraga onuta onuzu ri andru
text.lug: Baasomye ebbaluwa yaffe ey'okwemulugunya leero.
text.nyn: Ebaruha yaitu y'okwetomboitwa, yashomwa eriizooba.
text.teo: Aponi osiomai ebaluwa lo angurian wok ilolo.
text.eng: They read our letter of complaint today.
text.ibo: Ha gụrụ akwụkwọ mkpesa anyị taa.
text.swa: Walisoma barua yetu ya malalamishi leo.

text.ach: Omyero pe ki koo luring ayella i kom dano mukene
text.lgg: Le 'ba ma gbu emunyale eyi kala ku
text.lug: Abanoonyiboobubudamu tebalina kusosolebwa.
text.nyn: Empungi tizishemereire kushororwa.
text.teo: Mam ekoto agitarit ikerai.
text.eng: Refugees should not be segregated.
text.ibo: Ekwesịghị ịkpara ndi gbara ọsọndụ, oke.
text.swa: Wakimbizi hawafai kubaguliwa.

text.ach: Pe ki culu lupwonye maber
text.lgg: Ba ofeni imba'ba eyi muke ku
text.lug: Abasomesa tebasasulwa bulungi.
text.nyn: Abegyesa tibarikushashurwa gye.
text.teo: Mam isisianakinak etacio ejok.
text.eng: Teachers are not well paid.
text.ibo: Anaghị akwụzi ndi nkụzi ụkwọ.
text.swa: Walimu hawapati malipo mazuri

text.ach: Watwero juku timo bal ikabedo wa i yo mene?
text.lgg: Ama ecoki a'di 'di e'yo onzi be ongulumu eyi ma alea geri ngosi?
text.lug: Tuyinza tutya okulwanyisa obumenyi bw'amateeka mu bitundu?
text.nyn: Nitubaasa kurwanisa tuta ebihagaro omu bantu?
text.teo: Eipone ali itijio oni ebenyit kotunga?
text.eng: How can we fight crime in society?
text.ibo: Kedụ otu anyị ga-esi lụọ agha ime-mpụ na gburugburu anyị?
text.swa: Tunawezaje kupambana na uhalifu katika jamii?

text.ach: Cwiny dano weng ocwee i kome
text.lgg: Ba dria eyi eca candisi eri si
text.lug: Yamazeemu abantu bonna amaanyi.
text.nyn: Abantu boona bakamuhwa amatsiko.
text.teo: Itunga kere apotu okadakisi kanu angesi.
text.eng: All people were disappointed in her.
text.ibo: Omechuru mmadụ nile ihu.
text.swa: Watu wote walikasirika na yeye.

text.ach: Baba na owilo mutoka manyen
text.lgg: Ata mavileri je mutukari o'diruni
text.lug: Taata wange yagula emmotoka endala.
text.nyn: Taata aguzire emotoka nsya
text.teo: Abu papaka ogwel emotoka loitetet.
text.eng: My father bought a new car.
text.ibo: Nnam zụrụ ụgboala ọhụrụ.
text.swa: Baba yangu alinunua  gari jipya

text.ach: Lumemba me committee gubedo ki kacoke
text.lgg: Ba Komiti 'da ma alea 'diyi 'ye mitingi andru ra
text.lug: Abatuula ku kakiiko k'oku ntikko baalina akakiiko.
text.nyn: Bamemba bakakiiko, bakashutama.
text.teo: Apotu imeban luko okomiti ojaikinos airiamun.
text.eng: The committee members had a meeting.
text.ibo: Ndi otu kọmitii nwere nzukọ.
text.swa: Wanachama wa kamati walikuwa na mkutano.

text.ach: Lweny obedo tye laworo
text.lgg: Aco azi aje ci
text.lug: Waabaddewo okulwanagana eggulo.
text.nyn: Habaireho endwano nyomwabazyo.
text.teo: Ajai bian ejie.
text.eng: There was a fight yesterday.
text.ibo: A lụrụ ọgụ echi gara aga.
text.swa: Kulikuwa na vita jina.

text.ach: Wee ne okelo kuc ki maa itwok piny eni
text.lgg: Ongo erivile 'diyi otu asianzu azini leta 'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma eselea
text.lug: Ennyimba ze zaaleeta emirembe n'okwagala mu bantu b'ekitundu.
text.nyn: Ebyeshongoro bye bikaba nibireeta obusingye na rukundo omu bantu b'ekyanga ekyo.
text.teo: Etopolorit aiwo ke aipuc ka amina nejaas itunga lu atutubet.
text.eng: His music promoted peace and love among people in the region.
text.ibo: Egwu ya na-akwalite udo na ihụnanya n'etiti ndi nọ na mpaghara a.
text.swa: Nyimbo zake zilikuza amani na upendo kati ya watu katika kanda.

text.ach: Lutedero tye ka kuru muni ma obi galo wang gi
text.lgg: Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ava be angiri lezu nezu mundu eyini avita eyi 'yezu eyi dri
text.lug: Abatuuze bali bulindaala okulaba nga basanyusibwa ba kyeruppe.
text.nyn: Abatuuragye nibakunda ngu bareebe abajungu barikubashemeza.
text.teo: Imuitos itunga awanyun itunga lu akwangak isiyalaete kes.
text.eng: Residents are eager to see whites entertaining them.
text.ibo: Ndi bi ebe ahụ na-achọsi ike ihụ mgbe ndi ọcha ga-eme ha obi ụtọ.
text.swa: Wakaazi wana hamu ya kuona wazungu wakiwaburudisha.

text.ach: Omyero wa gwok lengo i gangi wa
text.lgg: Le ama ma mba aku amavile 'diyi ma ta alaru
text.lug: Tulina okukuuma amaka gaffe nga mayonjo.
text.nyn: Tushemereire kurinda amaka gaitu gari amayonjo.
text.teo: Ekot oni aidar ireria wok olaete.
text.eng: We should keep our homes clean.
text.ibo: Anyị ga na-edosa ebe obibi anyị ọcha.
text.swa: Tunapaswa kuweka maboma yetu safi.

text.ach: Omine owilo yat mo ite
text.lgg: Eri ma adri je aro azi ki erini ra
text.lug: Muganda we omulenzi yamugulira edagala erimu.
text.nyn: Omubazi ogumwe, akagugurirwa munyaanya.
text.teo: Abu onaceke ogwelak nges ikee.
text.eng: Her brother purchased some medicine for her.
text.ibo: Nwanne ya nwoke zụtaara ya ụfọdụ ọgwụ.
text.swa: Kaka yake alimnunulia baadhi ya dawa.

text.ach: Lupur twero puru cam kibene gwoko lee
text.lgg: Ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi eco ori eyi ezo azini anyapa eyi ma ta mba sa'wa aluri ma alea ra
text.lug: Abalimi basobola okulima ebimera n'okulunda ebisolo mu budde bwe bumu.
text.nyn: Abahingi nibabaasa kuhinga ebihingwa, kandi bagira n'amatungo aha murundi nigwo gumwe.
text.teo: Epedorete akoriok akoru ikorion ka aipit ibaren apak adiope.
text.eng: Farmers can grow crops and rear animals at the same time.
text.ibo: Ndi ọrụ ugbo nwere ike ịna akọ ubi n'akpakwa anụmanụ n'otu mgbe ahụ.
text.swa: Wakulima wanaweza kupanda mimea na kufuga wanyama kwa wakati mmoja.

text.ach: Ladit wi gang kwanwa obi loko ki gang kwan diki
text.lgg: Dricere amavileri ni e'yo nze 'ba sukulu'a 'diyi be drusi
text.lug: Omukulu w'essomero lyaffe ajja okwogerako eri essomero enkya.
text.nyn: Mukuru w'eishomero ryaitu, naija kugamba nyenkyakare.
text.teo: Elosi apolon esomero kosi aijaikin einer nejaas idwe moi.
text.eng: Our headteacher shall address the school tomorrow.
text.ibo: Onye isi nkuzi ụlọakwụkwọ anyị, ga-agwa ụmụakwụkwọ okwu echi.
text.swa: Mwalimu wetu mkuu atahutubia shule kesho.

text.ach: Wii pem konyo wa ki ngolo nam
text.lgg: Daraza eyi ama aza ko yi rapi rara 'diyi alizu ewakokoru
text.lug: Olutindo lutuyamba okusomoka amangu omugga.
text.nyn: Orutindo nirutwanguhiza okucwekanisa omugyera.
text.teo: Ingarakit oni edaraca kanu atubonoror ocilet apatanu.
text.eng: The bridge helps us cross the river easily.
text.ibo: Akwa mmiri a nyere aka n'ime ka ọ diri anyị nfe i na-agafe osimiri a.
text.swa: Daraja inatusaidia tuvuke mto kwa urahisi.

text.ach: Lok me wot idictriktye magoro
text.lgg: Geri 'ba eyini acizu distrikiti 'da ma alea 'diyi onzi
text.lug: Disitulikiti zirimu enguudo embi.
text.nyn: Eby'engyenda omu disiturikiti, tibibonaire.
text.teo: Etiono eipone lo elose kodisitriktan kangul.
text.eng: There is a poor transport network in the districts.
text.ibo: E nweregasịrị ụzọ njem na-adịghị nma na mpaghara ndi ahụ.
text.swa: Mtandao wa usafiri kkwenye wilaya ni mbaya.

text.ach: Dano omyero gutii kacelo pi kelo dongo lobo i dictrikgi
text.lgg: Le 'ba eyi ma eciti angu ezoma distrikiti'a ri ma omgbo edrizu
text.lug: Abantu balina okukolera awamu okusobola okwongera ku nkulaakulana mu disitulikiti.
text.nyn: Abantu bashemereire kukwatanisa, okubaasa kwongyera entunguuka omu disiturikiti.
text.teo: Ekot itunga aiswamanara kanu aikeun apol ko disitrikt.
text.eng: People should cooperate to enhance development in the district.
text.ibo: Ndi mmadụ kwesịrị ịtinyekọta aka n'ịhụ na e welitere mmehe na mpaghara a.
text.swa: Watu wanapaswa kushirikiana kuimarisha maendeleo katika eneo.

text.ach: Lockdown orii pi dwe abicel
text.lgg: E'yo 'bani afa dria ma ti opizu ci ri 'du imba azia
text.lug: Omuggalo gwamala emyezi mukaaga.
text.nyn: Akeeshereko kakamara emyezi mukaaga.
text.teo: Abu agolokinio naka akwap oyangaik ilapio ikanyape.
text.eng: The lockdown lasted six months.
text.ibo: Nkpọchi a nọrọ ọnwa isii.
text.swa: Kufungwa kwa shughuli za kawaida za nchi kulichukua miezi sita.

text.ach: En odoto ngat ma obutu kede tek tek ni bot abili
text.lgg: Eri to agu 'ba obipi okposi 'da polisi'a
text.lug: Yaloopye eyamusobyako ku poliisi.
text.nyn: Akahababira omuhambi aha poriisi.
text.teo: Abu ngesi olimo lo abui aisiol nges polis.
text.eng: She reported the rapist to the police.
text.ibo: O kpegosiri ndi uweoji onye ahụ kwara mmadụ mpụ n'ike.
text.swa: Alimripoti mbakaji kwa polisi.

text.ach: Minictry me ngom tye ka neno lok ma kwako ngom ma aa ki ikabedo weng ma ilobo ni
text.lgg: Okalamvu nyaku niri ni e'yo ndundu nyaku eyi ma dria 'diyi ma aza ko kari 'di ma alea ndulu
text.lug: Minisitule ky'ebyettaka ekola ku ensonga wamu n'emisango egyekuusa ku ttaka okwetooloola eggwanga lyonna.
text.nyn: Minisiture y'ebyeitaka neekora ahashonga ezikwatiraine neitaka hamwe n'emishango omwihanga ryona.
text.teo: Itemonokini eerionget loka lands ingungeta lu alupok kakwap kere.
text.eng: The ministry of lands is handling land-related matters and cases countrywide.
text.ibo:
Ngalaba ndi ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ala, na-anabata okwu ma ọ bụ ikpe 
metụtara ala na gburugburu obodo nile.
text.swa: Wizara ya ardhi  inashughulikia suala linalohusiana na ardhi na kesi  nchi nzima.

text.ach: Bang gungolo wel cente ma dano omyero ogam pien onongo gipeke ki ngo me ajenga
text.lgg: Erojo eyi 'baki robia 'ba eyini eco 'du loni ruri ma omgbo ci a'dusikuni eyivile afa eyini eco ayu loni 'duzu 'diyi yo
text.lug: Banka zaakendeeza ku muwendo gw'ensimbi eziweebwa abantu olw'obutaba na musingo.
text.nyn: Za banka zikaba niziheereza abantu esente nkye ahabw'okugira ngu tibaine musingo.
text.teo: Apotu banks itidisiasi etiai lo ikapun lu ijanakino itunga naarai amamiatatar kesi keda ayuara.
text.eng: Banks limited the amount of money given to the people because they lacked security.
text.ibo:
Ụlọakụ tinyere mmachi na-ọnụ ego a na-enye ndi mmadụ n'ihe ha enyeghị 
ihe ntụkwasiobi.
text.swa: Benki ilipunguza kiasi cha feha kilikuwa kinawapa watu kwa sababu hazikuwa na thamana.

text.ach: Ladit lobo pwod oywek ikin dano
text.lgg: Purezidenti ni nga po'di nizaru 'ba eyi ma eselea
text.lug: Pulezidenti akyali muganzi eri abantu.
text.nyn: Omwebeembezi w'eihanga abantu nibakimukunda.
text.teo: Eringa lokapolon akwap ejenara kanejaas itunga.
text.eng: The president is still popular among the people.
text.ibo: Onyeisi obodo kabụkwa onye amama na etiti ndi mmadụ.
text.swa: Rais bado ni maarufu miongoni mwa watu.

text.ach: Cwiny dano obedo yom pi jami ma kimiyo itgi
text.lgg: Ayiko fu 'ba ongulumu 'da ma alea 'diyi afa eyini esu 'diyisi
text.lug: Abantu baali basanyufu olw'obuyambi bwe baafuna.
text.nyn: Abantu bakeshemererwa ahabw'ebintu ebi batungire.
text.teo: Eyalamasi itunga kanu agangat na apotu kesi odumutu.
text.eng: The community was happy and excited about the donation they received.
text.ibo: Nnukwu obi ụtọ dị ndi obodo a maka onyinye ha natara.
text.swa: Jamii ilifurahia na kusisimka kwa msaada waliopokea.

text.ach: Kiloro gangi lega i Uganda ikare ma two corona opoto
text.lgg: Kari Uganda niri ma alea, 'ba opi pari izita izizu 'diyi ci sa'wa azo korona nirisi
text.lug: Mu Uganda, amasinzizo gaggalwawo mu biseera by'okubalukawo kw'akawuka ka kolona.
text.nyn: Omu Uganda, emyanya y'amaramizo ekakingwa, endwara ya korona ku yabarukireho.
text.teo: Ko Uganda, aponi ogolokinai aiboisio nuka ailip kapak na abwangunor adeka na ekorona.
text.eng: In Uganda, places of worship were shut down during the coronavirus outbreak.
text.ibo: A bịa na Uganda, e mechiri ebe nile a na-ekpe ekpere n'oge ọrịa coronavirus.
text.swa: Maeneo ya ibada yalifungwa wakati wa mlipuko wa virusi vya corona Uganda.

text.ach: Won kom me committee waco ni omyero ada obed tye i kare me poko cente eni
text.lgg: Bili ei Komiti niri ai 'ba eyi aa'zu e'yo ada be sa'wa robia awazu e'yo ndundu eyi 'yezu risi
text.lug: Ssentebe w'akakiiko asabye obwerufu mu ngabanya y'obuyambi buno.
text.nyn: Mukuru w'entebe yakakiiko, naashaba abantu okuba abeesigwa omu kukozesa esente ezi.
text.teo: Abu eceyaman loka ekomiti ilip eswamae loajokan kapak na akorakinere ikapun lu.
text.eng: The committee chairman calls for transparency during the allocation of these funds.
text.ibo:
Onyeisi oche otu nzukọ a, chọrọ ka-ejiri ụzọ ga edo onye ọbụla anya 
were ke ego ndi a.
text.swa: Mwenye kiti wa kamati anatoa wito wa kuwepo kwa uwazi wakati wa kutengwa kwa pesa hizi.

text.ach: Gamente pe odwoko cwiny lupwony me timo tic.
text.lgg: Gamete engani imba'ba ma ava ku
text.lug: Gavumenti tewadde basomesa maanyi.
text.nyn: Gavumenti t'ehaire abashomesa omuhimbo
text.teo: Mam apugan isinyikokinit esisianakinak.
text.eng: The government has not motivated the teachers.
text.ibo: Gọọmenti emebeghị ndi nkuzi a ihe nkwalite.
text.swa: Serikali haijawahamasisha walimu.

text.ach: Abili myero omak lulweny alibo ne weng.
text.lgg: Polisi (arumadri) ma obii 'ba aribo ru 'di yi dria
text.lug: Poliisi esaanidde okukwata abatujju bonna.
text.nyn: Poriisi eshemraire kukwata abazigu boona
text.teo: Ibusakinit ipolisin aikamar lukodwaratau kere.
text.eng: The police should arrest all the terrorists.
text.ibo: Ndi uweoji kwesịrị ijide ndi a nile na-eyi ọha egwu.
text.swa: Polisi wanapaswa kuwakamata magaidi wote.

text.ach: Kwero loc nongo dong ocake wa con kadi nongo pud pe kiyabo ka bolo kwir.
text.lgg: Omu nyza agata si ri ovu andra sizaru oko kele de nga 'ba nzi pari opetaa ni 'diyi ku
text.lug: Ekibiina ekinaawangula kyawandiikibwa ng'ebula ekiseera ebifo ebironderwamu biggulwewo.
text.nyn: Embaga y'okujaaguza obuhanguzi ekahandiikwa gye batakigwiire n’ahokutereera akaruuru.
text.teo: Adaunitai aiwadik epate loitelekaarit eringa engara aiboisio nuka aicak abootin.
text.eng: The victory party was written well before polling centers opened.
text.ibo: Edere ihe ọma banyere otu mmeri a, tupu ụlọ ọrụ ndi ntuli aka amalite ọrụ.
text.swa: Chama cha ushindi kiliandikwa vizuri kabla vituo vya kupigia kura havijafunguliwa.

text.ach: Teko cwiny pa luyak ne omiye ngeng tutwal.
text.lgg: Ovu osutasi asi mbaza oguata 'diyi ni ri ma e'yosi
text.lug: Yeewuunya nnyo obuvumu ababbi abo bwe baalina.
text.nyn: Akagyira okutiina ahabwa okumariira abashuma oku babaire baine
text.teo: Abu ngesi koumok noi kanuka atiting naka ikokolak ngun.
text.eng: He was shocked by the courage of the robbers.
text.ibo: Ụjọ tụrụ ya otu ndi ohi a si kaa obi.
text.swa: Alishangazwa na ujasiri wa wajambazi.

text.ach: Pe itii ki tenge makelo ngico onyo lyeto I motoka pien camo moo madwong kato.
text.lgg: Mi ma ayu oli ondiza e'dele mutukaria yi ma alia ri ku eri odu mvu angiri
text.lug: Tokozesa byuma bya mpewo (air conditioner) kubanga binywa amafuta mangi.
text.nyn: Otakakozesa ekyooma ekiri kutastyamu kandi kikashohoza omuyaga ahabukuba nikitwaara amajuuta miingyi
text.teo: Sirikitosom acuma naka ekwam naarai emasi akinyet naepol.
text.eng: Do not use an air conditioner it consumes more fuel.
text.ibo: Ejikwala ntụoyi n'ihi ọ na-aṅu nnukwu mmanụ.
text.swa: Usitumie kiyoyozi cha hewa hutumia mafuta zaidi.

text.ach: Kiyee ki motoka weng acel ki acel me tingo dano mukene adek (mapat ki ladwoc).
text.lgg: Ba fe mutukari alu alu ma 'du 'ba yi na
text.lug: Buli mmotoka ekkirizibwa kutwala basabaze basatu.
text.nyn: Buri mootoka neyikirizibwa okutwaara abashabazi bashaatu
text.teo: Ecamakinitai kangolimotoka ainap itunga iuni bon.
text.eng: Each car is only allowed to carry three passengers.
text.ibo: Ụgbọ-ala ọbụla bụ nanị mmadụ atọ ka a hapụrụ ya ibu.
text.swa: Kila gari linaruhusiwa kuwabeba watu watatu pekee.

text.ach: Jo matiyo kwedgi pe romo kobo bot dul mukene oyot-oyot.
text.lgg: Aje'ba eri ni 'diyi econi yi oja oseta azi 'diyiam ewa kokoru ru ku
text.lug: Si kyangu bakasitoma baabwe kukyusa layini yaabwe kudda ku ndala.
text.nyn: Abantu abarikumuguraho tibakaaza aha mikutu endiijo
text.teo: Mam agwelak ace epedorete aitosom icenetiwaks kapatan.
text.eng: Its customers cannot easily switch to other networks.
text.ibo: Ndi ahịa ya enweghi ike iji ike gbawe ga na netwọkụ ndi ọzọ.
text.swa: Wateja wake hawawezi kuhambia mtandao mwingine kwa urahisi.

text.ach: Onyuto miti ne me neno ni lobo del col oribbe me doko lobo acel.
text.lgg: Ece asisile I'ni lezu e'yo kari 'ba ini ru 'diyi ni ti ecizu ri ndre zu ra
text.lug: Yali ayagala okulaba amawanga ga Afirika nga gagattiddwa wamu okufuuka eggwanga limu eriyitibwa United States of Africa.
text.nyn: Ayine ekyetengo kyihango kureba ekibuga kya Africa.
text.teo: Abu ngesi kitodu eipud loka aanyun United States loka Africa.
text.eng: He expressed a desire to see the United States of Africa.
text.ibo: O gosịpụtara ọchịchọ ya ịhụ United States of Afrika
text.swa: Alionyesha nia ya kuona Umoja wa Mataifa ya Afrika.

text.ach: Ludwo lori I gudu madongo tiyo tutwal ki diro kacel ki ngec macon magitye kwede.
text.lgg: Dereva lori ti oji'ba 'diyi ma onita lori onzuzuri angiri tu
text.lug: Abagoba ba biroole abavugira ku nguudo ennene balina obumanyirivu bungi.
text.nyn: Abavugyi abebimootoka ebihango beine obukugu bweingyi omukuvuuga.
text.teo: Iderepan luka amotokan luapolok ejaasi keda amisiarit naepol noi.
text.eng: Highway truck drivers have a lot of experience.
text.ibo: Ndi na-anya gwongworo n'okporo ụzọ mbasara, enwela ọtụtụ ahụmihe.
text.swa: Madereva wa lori za barabara kuu wana uzoefu mwingi.

text.ach: Yubu kit ma cuma tyen motoka ocungu kwede myero kitim mwaka ki mwaka.
text.lgg: Ba ma 'ye whili ma otuza kililiru eli vusi
text.lug: Okutereeza obulungi emipiira gy'emmotoka kyetaaga okukolebwa buli mwaka.
text.nyn: Okutereeza orupanka rwa mootoka kishemeraire kuba kinkirwa buri mwaka
text.teo: Aiteten akeje nuka emotoka ibusakinit aswam kangolikaru.
text.eng: Proper wheel alignment should be done every year.
text.ibo: Ezigbo nhazi ụkwụ ụgbọala bụ ihe ekwesịrị i na-eme afọ nile.
text.swa: Ufungaji sahihi wa gurudumu unapaswa kufanywa kila mwaka.

text.ach: Pol can me gudu maro time I dye wor.
text.lgg: Drileonzi nzila dria 'diyi yi o'ye ini si karakara
text.lug: Obubenje bw'oku nguudo obusinga bubaawo kiro.
text.nyn: Butandu enyingyi az'ahanguto nizibaho nyekyiro.
text.teo: Akangasia nuipu nuka orotin iswamaununos kware.
text.eng: Many road accidents happen at night.
text.ibo: Ọtụtụ ihe mberede okporo ụzọ na-eme n'abalị.
text.swa: Ajali nyingi za barabarani hutokea usiku.

text.ach: Myero ogig lweny matye I kin gangi gi.
text.lgg: Amuti ma truu e'yo afu fuza  ni yi ma eselea ri si ra
text.lug: Balina okumalawo okulwanagana mu bibiina byabwe.
text.nyn: Ebibiina bishemereire kurwanisa entaaro  zaabo.
text.teo: Ibusakinit kes aitemokin iceleta luejaasi opateikec.
text.eng: They should reconcile the fights in their parties.
text.ibo: Ha kwesịrị ikpezi esemokwu ndi na nnọkọ otu ha.
text.swa: Wasuluhishe mapigano katika vyama vyao.

text.ach: Nambooze okok I kom lucoo lok angea pi kelo telle I dul me Democratic Party.
text.lgg: Nambozee too 'ba osisia ni 'diyi trikitriki ejiza amuti Democratic party ni ma alia si
text.lug: Nambooze yanenya emikutu gy'empuliziganya nti gye gyali gireeseewo obukuubagano mu DP.
text.nyn: Namboozi navunaana ab'amahurire okureetaho okwahukana omu nkora eya dimokuraase
text.teo: Abu Namboeze kitoron arotak iyemuto kanu ayangaunun ingungeta kopate loka DP.
text.eng: Nambooze accused the media of bringing friction in the Democratic Party.
text.ibo:
Nambooze na-ebo ndi mgbasa-ozi ebubo, maka ị na-ebute ọgbaahara 
n'otu ndi Democratic Party.
text.swa: Nambooze alishutumu vyombo vya habari kwa kuleta msuguano katika Chama cha Demokrasia.

text.ach: Adwogi yer pa ladit lobo myero kinyut I iwi redio.
text.lgg: Ba ma azi sa driasi o'duko opeta kari niri geriko radioa si
text.lug: Ebiba bivudde mu kulonda kwa pulezidenti birina okulangirirwa ku leediyo.
text.nyn: Ebirikuruga omu buruuru bwokuronda  omwebenzi we'ihanga bishemeriere kurangyirirwa aha rediyo.
text.teo: Nuelomunitos kotoma aseo naka lokapolon akwap ibusakinit duc alimor koyemuto.
text.eng: Presidential election results should always be announced on the radio.
text.ibo: E kwesịrị ị na-akpọpụta npụta ntuli aka onyeisi ala, n'igwe redio.
text.swa: Matokeo ya uchaguzi wa urais yanapaswa kutangazwa kwenye redio kila mara.

text.ach: Loro gang kwan obino ki adwogi I kom dano weng.
text.lgg: Sukulu ti opiza eza 'ba dria ma dri
text.lug: Okuggala amasomero kikosezza buli omu.
text.nyn: Okukingwa kwa'mashomero kukwatsire ahari budyomwe.
text.teo: Agolokinio naka isomeroi etirorit itunga kere.
text.eng: The closure of schools has affected everyone.
text.ibo: Mmechi ụlọakwụkwọ emetụtala mmadụ nile.
text.swa: Kufungwa kwa shule kumeathiri kila mtu.

text.ach: Guyubu lega me pwoyo lubanga pi gwoko kwogi.
text.lgg: Yi otu Munguziza awa'difo fezu Mungu dri erini yi ma idri tambalerisi
text.lug: Baategeka okusaba basobole okwebaza Katonda olw'okubakuuma nga balamu.
text.nyn: Bakatebeekanisa okusiima Ruhanga ahabw'okukiza amagara gaabo.
text.teo: Apotu kitemokisi ailip kanu aisiyalamikin Edeke kanuka aidar aijarakec.
text.eng: They organized prayers to thank God for preserving their lives.
text.ibo: Ha kpọkọtara ndi ekpere iji kele Chineke maka ichekwube ndụ ha.
text.swa: Walipanga maombi ya kumshukuru Mungu kwa kuhifadhi maisha yao.

text.ach: Pol biyacara tye kaloro kabedogi pi ngwec yuggi.
text.lgg: Tujara pari yi ti opii azanga efupi okurunya ma aliari ma e'yo si
text.lug: Bizineesi nnyingi ziggaddwawo olw'ekivundu ekiva mu kasasiro oyo.
text.nyn: Emishuburo mwingi ekingiire aha bw'ekinuuko ky'ebisingo.
text.teo: Epote ibiasaran luipu agolokinio kanuka euria loka agasia kangul.
text.eng: Most businesses are shutting down due to the smell of the rubbish.
text.ibo: Ọtụtụ ụlọahia na-emechi, n'ihi isi ureghere.
text.swa: Biashara nyingi zinafungwa kutokana na harufu ya takataka.

text.ach: Jami tic matye kombedi ticgi dong peke.
text.lgg: Afa ci ecozu azi ngazu 'diyi ma orodri curu'do yo
text.lug: Eby'okukozesa ebiriwo tebikyagasa.
text.nyn: Ebikozesebwa ebiriho tibikyiine mugasho.
text.teo: Mam bobo iboro luejaasi eraasi luingarakinete jokan.
text.eng: The available tools are no longer useful.
text.ibo: Ejighịkwa ngwa ọrụ dịnụ, arụ ọrụ ọzọ.
text.swa: Zana zinazopatikana hazifai tena.

text.ach: Lapilida ne okelo caden I kot.
text.lgg: Ba azita duani ni laapiri eji afa ecetaru dwani drilia indi
text.lug: Omulamuzi yaleeta obujulizi mu kkooti.
text.nyn: Omuramuzi  akareeta obuhame omu kooti.
text.teo: Abu epulida koyangau aitogogongoret okooti.
text.eng: The lawyer brought the evidence to the court.
text.ibo: Onye ọkaikpe wetara ihi ịkgbaama n'ụlọikpe.
text.swa: Wakili alileta ushahidi mahakamani.

text.ach: Minicta ne oyeto daa ne.

text.lgg: Efi aleniari aga wura erini ena ri ra.

text.teo: Einakini aitodiaret ngin ibore yenedepari aitodiar aputo naibus.

text.ach: Man obino yonge dwe aryo cako ma layub cim enoni oketo cat me but dulgi I cuk (share).
text.lgg: E'yo 'di eca de mba eri vutia esu de okalamvu simu nde edepiri e'da sende omgbo I vilealeru ri ngopiyari 'bo.
text.lug: Enkulaakulana eno ezze emyezi ebiri oluvannyuma lw'abakozi b'amasimu lwe yafulumya emigabo gyayo.

text.swa: Maendeleo haya yanakuja miezi miwili tangu mtengenezaji wa rununu aliorodhesha hisa zake

text.lgg: Agu aro nde edepiri ma egata kini ari onyiruri ma aleni I ayura.
text.lug: Omukozi agamba nti ovaamu omusaayi mungi.
text.nyn: Orikukakora naakihamya ngu eshagama nungi neehwerera.

text.ach: Ludiro owaco ni myero gudwok kero me lweny enoni i tyeko peki matye I lok me tela matye I dul ne.

text.eng: Experts say the energy should be focused on fast resolving the administration issue
text.ibo:
Ndi ọkachamara sị na-ike a, kwesịrị iji lekwasị anya na otu aga-esi na egbo mkpa 
ihe gbasara ọchịchị, ọsọ ọsọ.

text.ach: Tenge me cim I lobo Uganda tye ki pyem matek tutwal.
text.lgg: Amuti Uganda telecom niri mile mbaru
text.lug: Omulimu gwa Uganda Telecom gwa kuvuganya nnyo.
text.nyn: Eby'empurizagana omu Uganda nimurwanirwa.
text.eng: Uganda's telecom industry is so competitive
text.ibo: Ụlọ ọrụ kọmpụta na Uganda bụ ihe ịsọmpi
text.swa: Sekta ya simu ya Uganda ni ya ushindani sana

text.ach: Jo me tenge pa Anite cero lok ni Uganda Telecom obedo dul pa gamente.
text.lgg: Te 'ba Anite vile 'diyi 'yo kini okalamvu 'di gavumete ni.
text.lug: Oludda lwa Anite lugamba nti Uganda Telecom kkampuni ya gavumenti.
text.nyn: Orubaju rwa Anite rukagira ngu Uganda Telecom n’ekitongore kya gavumenti.
text.eng: Anite's side argued that Uganda Telecom is a government entity
text.ibo:
Ndi otu Anite rụrụ ụka, na-ụlọ ọrụ eji ekwentị agbasa ozi dị na Uganda, 
bụ nke gọọmenti.
text.swa: Upande wa Anite ulisema kwamba Telecom ya Uganda ni chombo cha serikali

text.ach: I kare weng Bemanya tye ki telle I kin gin ki minicta Anite.
text.lgg: Bemanya ni sa driasi eyo isu Anite be i.
text.lug: Bemanya abeera mu kukuubagana ne minisita Anite.
text.nyn: Bemanya atwire omu ntaro na minisita Anite.
text.eng: Bemanya is always in conflict with Minister Anite.
text.ibo: Bemanya na Minister Anite na-enwekarị esemokwu.
text.swa: Bemanya daima anapingana na Waziri Anite.

text.ach: Onyuto man atyer kamaleng.
text.lgg: Ba e'yo nde ngmbo ru
text.lug: Yakikoze nga kitegeerekeka.
text.nyn: Akakishoboorora.
text.teo: Abu ngesi kitacau ngun.
text.eng: He made it clear.
text.ibo: O mere ka aghọta ya.
text.swa: Aliweka wazi.

text.ach: Cul ma dul me Confederation of African Football oculu ki Lagardere myero ocak yub me pyem me nongo tic.
text.lgg: Le ofeta Confederation of African Football ni Lagarde ni ofezuri ma nzi yi mile driwala azi ndazuri 'bazu mgbo ru.
text.lug: Okuliyirira kw'akakiiko akaddukanya omupiira gw'ebigere mu Afirika eri Largadere kulina okukubiriza okuddamu okuggulawo abasigansimbi mu ddembe ly'abantu.
text.nyn: Okushashurwa oku kushemereire kugaruramu amaani abarikwenda kuhakanira okugura.
text.teo: Atacakinio naka ikapun luka Atukot Naka Emopira koAfrica mama ejai Largadre ibusakinit aisinyikokin ekisil loka atupakin nuedaunitai acamanar
text.eng: Confederation of African football compensation to Lagardere should encourage the re-opening of bidding rights.
text.ibo:
Ego ndi otu nnọkọta bọọlụ ndi Afrika, kwụrụ Lagardere, kwesịrị ikwalite, mehe 
ikike ikwe ọnụ ahịa.
text.swa: Ushirikiano wa fidia ya mpira wa miguu ya Afrika kwa Lagardere unapaswa kuhamasisha ufunguzi wa haki za zabuni.

text.ach: Dul me Confederation of African football tiyo ite cik me lobo Switzerland.
text.lgg: Confederation of African Foodball ni azita Swiss niri ma palaa.
text.lug: Akakiiko akaddukanya omupiira gw'ebigere mu Afirika kali wansi w'amateeka ga Swiss.
text.nyn: Ekitongore kya Bufirika eky’omupiira kiri aha nsi y’ekiragiro kya Swiss.
text.teo: Ejai Atukot Naka Emopira KoAfrica toma okisila luko Swiss.
text.eng: The confederation of African football is under Swiss laws.
text.ibo: Nnọkọta ndi bọọlụ Afrika nọ na-okpuru  iwu ndi Swiss.
text.swa: Shirikisho la mpira wa miguu wa Kiafrika liko chini ya sheria za Uswizi.

text.ach: Bedo ki wang kabit tutwal ilo rwom me moko tam pa lutic me yot-kom.
text.lgg: Azo eti ondaza okporu ri orodri ru 'ba azi ngapi aro joa 'diyi dri, e'yo amazu.
text.lug: Enkola y'okunoonyereza ku byobulamu eyamba ku basawo okukola okusalawo okulungamu.
text.nyn: Okucondooza kw’amani omubyamagara nikuhwera abakozi b’ebyamagara okusharamu.
text.teo: Aingicio naka adekasinei ingarakini kotoma aitolomunun aseununeta nuka eswamak luka angaleu.
text.eng: Strong surveillance improves the decision-making of health workers.
text.ibo: Mkpachapụanya siri ike, na-enwete ọganihu na-atụmatụ ndi ọrụ ahụike
text.swa: Uchunguzi wenye nguvu unaboresha maamuzi ya wafanyikazi wa afya.

text.ach: Lucung iwi bye kacel lucwakgi gunyweno wii lubol kwir ki lucwak.
text.lgg: Ba politiki-a 'diyi, o'bi yi atipi 'diyi pie, abaza fe o'bi voti' bepi azini o'bi yi atipi 'diyi ma eselea.
text.lug: Bannabyabufuzi n'abawagizi baabwe batabula abalonzi n'abawagizi.
text.nyn: Ab’ebyobutegyeki hamwe n’abahagizi baabo nibaburabuza abateezi bakaruuru hamwe nabarikubashagika.
text.teo: Abwoak keda egangitok kere mam ejenete atiaketai naejai kiding aseak keda egangitok.
text.eng: Both politicians and their supporters confuse the voters and the supporters.
text.ibo:
Ndi ndọrọndọrọ na ndi nkwado ha megharịrị ndi ntuli aka na 
ndi nkwado ha anya
text.swa: Wanasiasa wote na wafuasi wao wanachanganya wapiga kura na wafuasi.

text.ach: Pire tek tutwal me ngeyo apoka-poka matye I kin bito kwir ki bolo kwir.
text.lgg: Eri orodri ru voti ondaza ma esele cozu voti 'beza be.
text.lug: Kikulu nnyo okumanya enjawulo wakati w'okukuyega n'okulonda.
text.nyn: Nikikuru kumanya entaniso eri ahakuhagira n’okuteera akaruuru.
text.teo: Ejokuna noi ajenun atiaketait naejai kiding aise keda ekampein.
text.eng: It is important to know the difference between campaigning and voting.
text.ibo: Ọ dị mkpa ịma ihe dị iche n'etiti mgbasa ozi na ntuli aka.
text.swa: Ni muhimu kujua tofauti kati ya kufanya kampeni na kupiga kura.

text.ach: Uganda tye ki wel dano mabolo kwir milyon 19.4
text.lgg: Ba ecopi voti 'bepi ra Uganda-ari yi milioni mudri drini oromi du su.
text.lug: Uganda erina abalonzi obukadde kkumi na mwenda n'obutundutundu buna.
text.nyn: Uganda eine abateezi bakaruuru miriyoni ikumi na mwenda n’obucweeka buna.
text.teo: Ejaasi Uganda keda itunga imilionin itomonakanyaongon luepedorete aise.
text.eng: Uganda has a 19.4 million voting population.
text.ibo: Uganda nwere ọnụgụgụ ndi ntuli aka nde-iri-na-itoolu-na-puku anọ.
text.swa: Uganda ina idadi ya wapiga kura milioni 19.4.

text.ach: Teme me nongo lok angeya ryoryo ocako doko nok inge donyo pa cable television
text.lgg: E'yo afa yi 'bazi tro tro 'diyi e'do ti onze ecata amuti afa ondredreani television ru ri geri wayi tala siri ni si
text.lug: Okunoonya okwenkanyankanya kwakendeera oluvannyuma lwokujja kwa terefayina ez'okusasulira
text.nyn: Okuronda oburinganiza kikatandikaho bwanyima y’okwija kwa terevijoni.
text.teo: Abu eipud loka aijulakin kobu neayangaunete itelebiosionin luejaasi keda ewaiya.
text.eng: The search for balance began to retreat with the arrival of cable television.
text.ibo:
Mmadụ ịchọ ihe oji onye ya eme malitere ịla azụ na mpụta enyonyo televishọn 
igwe eji waya mee.
text.swa: Utaftaji wa usawa ulianza kurudi na kuwasili kwa televisheni ya cable.

text.ach: Lok angeya ma kiyero ni mono be pi loc alwak?
text.lgg: E'yo 'ba o'duko eceza niri ma 'eyo 'duzu opezaru ri onyiru e'yo democratia niri ni ecozu azi ngazu?
text.lug: Okulondamu obubondo kigasa demokulasiya okukola?
text.nyn: Amakuru agagyendereirwe nigahwera obugabe bw’okusharamu kutibwa omu nkora?
text.teo: Eraasi kereka akiro nuekotoi aitolomun nuejokuka kanu aseun nuekotosi itunga?
text.eng: Is targeted information necessary for democracy to function?
text.ibo: Okwu a ezubere, ọ dị mkpa n'ịhụ na-ọchịchị onye kwue uche ya rụrụ ọrụ?
text.swa: Je! Habari inayolengwa ni muhimu kwa demokrasia kufanya kazi?

text.ach: Lutela ma I Rwanda kombedi dong gineno Museveni calo lamone
text.lgg: Drileka Rwandaari sa'disi Musevenii ni dre aribo ru
text.lug: Obukulembeze bwa Rwanda bulaba Museveni ng'omulabe.
text.nyn: Abebembezi ba Rwanda obwahati nibareeba Museveni nk’omuzigu.
text.teo: Eseseni kwana engarenon loko Rwanda Museveni kwape lokasurup.
text.eng: The Rwanda leadership now views Museveni as an enemy.
text.ibo: Ndi ọchịchị Rwanda ugbu a na-ewezi Museveni dika onye iro.
text.swa: Uongozi wa Rwanda sasa unamwona Museveni kama adui.

text.ach: Tek it lutela me Kigali me geno ka Museveni biketo itic winye mo keken ikin gi
text.lgg: Eri ewaru drileka Kigalia ri ni apizu Museveni ma e'yo owita erita ciri ma driari ni si
text.lug: Kizibu obukulembeze mu Kigali okwesiga okwewaayo kwa Museveni ku ndagaano yonna.
text.nyn: Kigumire Rwanda kwesiga Museveni omu kukora endagaano yona.
text.teo: Etionikinit apugan nako Kigali amunokin adiocamanar naitolimuni Museveni.
text.eng: It is difficult for leadership in Kigali to trust Museveni's commitment to any agreement.
text.ibo:
O nyere nsogbu ndi isi nọ na Kigali ikwenye na ngwa Museveni ga-ekwe
n'akwukwo nkwekọrịta ọbụla.
text.swa: Ni ngumu kwa uongozi huko Kigali kuamini kujitolea kwa Museveni kwa makubaliano yoyote.

text.ach: Rwanda ki Burundi pe kimaro poro gi iyo me tek pa mony gi
text.lgg: Ba ama ni nga Rwanda pi ma ale Burundi e'yo okpo marani ni 'diyi si ngba 'dini ku
text.lug: Rwanda ne Burundi balwawo okunoonyerezebwako ku musingi gw'amaanyi g'amagye.
text.nyn: Rwanda na Burundi tibarikukira kuteekateekwaho omu bikwatireine n'amaani g'ebyokurwanisa.
text.teo: Ecicing Rwanda keda Burundi apeganakin kanuka agogong naka ajore.
text.eng: Rwanda and Burundi are rarely explored based on military strength."
text.ibo:
Site n'otu ike ndi agha sị dị, obodo Rwanda na Burundi anaghị enwekarị ezi 
nchọpụta.
text.swa: Rwanda na Burundi hazichunguzwi sana kwa kuzingatia nguvu za kijeshi. "

text.ach: Yub man kono lumii tam en aye gubimoko ma omyero kimed ikom jami akwana
text.lgg: Te e'yo 'diri ma 'yeta sopa 'duta council ni e'yo onita wura ma siza si
text.lug: Enkulaakulana eno wabula yava ku kusalawo kw'akakiiko akateekateeka ebisomesebwa.
text.nyn: Enteekateeka egi neija kuteebwa omu nkora bwanyima y'okwikirizibwa akakiiko ka Curriculum development
text.teo: Erai akriot ngin naitolomunitai naekotosi luka ekansulo aitetem kotoma angetakinet naka aitolomun aisisiaeta.
text.eng: This development however is subject to the Council's conclusion of the curriculum development.
text.ibo: Mmepe a na-agbanyeghi, dabere na nkwubi okwu ndi kansụl banyere usoro mmepe.
text.swa: Maendeleo haya hata hivyo yanakabiliwa na hitimisho la baraza la maendeleo ya mtaala.

text.ach: Tim pa President Museveni me cimo Catherine Kusasira
text.lgg: E'yo drile kari ni Museveni ni Catherine Kusasira ni pezuri
text.lug: Pulezidenti Museveni yalonda Catherine Kusaasira.
text.nyn: Purezidenti Museveni okutoorana Catherine Kusasira.
text.teo: Abu Museveni koseu Catherine Kusasira.
text.eng: The appointment of Catherine Kusasira by President Museveni.
text.ibo: Nhụpọta onyeisi obodo Museveni, họpụtara Catherine Kusasira.
text.swa: Uteuzi wa Catherine Kusasira na Rais Museveni.

text.ach: Victoria Sekitooleko obibedo lalub kor Karuhanga pi mwaka adek
text.lgg: Victoria Sekitooleko ni nga ovu Karuhanga ma endruru ni
text.lug: Victoria Sekitooleko yajja okumyuka Karuhanga okumala emyaka esatu egiddako.
text.nyn: Victoria Sekitooleko niwe araakore nk'omuhwezi wa Karuhanga kumara emyaka eshatu eraakurateho.
text.teo: Victoria Sekitooleko ngesi ebuni araun atupiton naka Karuhanga kanu ikar iuni.
text.eng: Victoria Sekitooleko will deputize Karuhanga for the next three years.
text.ibo: Victoria Setitooleko ga-anọchi anya Karuhanga rue afọ atọ n'ihu.
text.swa: Victoria Sekitooleko atamwondoa Karuhanga kwa miaka mitatu ijayo.

text.ach: Bitature opako Private Sector Foundation me Uganda pi tic maber
text.lgg: Bitature eku amuti Private Sector Foundation Uganda niri ma ru azi ngaza okporurisi
text.lug: Bitature yatenderezza Private Sector Foundation Uganda olw'omulimu omulungi.
text.nyn: Bitature asiimire ekitongore kya Private sector Foundation Uganda ahabw'omurimo murungi ogukozirwe.
text.teo: Abu Bitature kitur Erionget Loka Itunga kanu aswamukec naejok noi.
text.eng: Bitature lauded the Private Sector Foundation Uganda for the great work.
text.ibo: Bitature tooro ndi Private Sector Foundation Uganda maka ezi ọrụ ha.
text.swa: Bitature ilisifu msingi wa sekta binafsi Uganda kwa kazi kubwa.

text.ach: Kampuni ma tiyo ikom waya, cokcoki otyero kamaleng kit me kube i yamo i Afrika.
text.lgg: Amuti wayi cable ni 'diri ebi tujara oseta olia aliasiri ma e'yo otuza kililiri ni angu Africa ni siri ma ti nzi eturisi ra
text.lug: Kkampuni ya Cable Company gye buvuddeko yatongoza engeri y'okuyungamu eby'obusuubuzi mu Afirika.
text.nyn: Kampuni y'amayengo ga yintaneeti  obuhweireho ekatongoza obuheereza bwayo omuri Afirika.
text.teo: Abu ekampuni loitolomi elago kitolomu arucokina kiding akwapin nuko Africa.
text.eng: The cable company recently launched Enterprise connectivity solutions in Africa.
text.ibo:
Ndi ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka imepụta waya, na nso nso a, amalitele ụzọ 
aga eji ejikọta ndi mgbalị ọrụ n' Afrika.
text.swa: Kampuni ya cable ilizindua hivi karibuni suluhisho za kuunganishwa kwa biashara barani Afrika.

text.ach: Dukl ma jubu kongo I Uganda  gitye ki ngec ni can pii tye I kare ni
text.lgg: Amuti Uganda Breweries niri ma dria e'yo yii ni ovuzu ewaru sawa 'di ma aliari ra
text.lug: Uganda Breweries efaayo nnyo ku bbula ly'amazzi mu kiseera kino.
text.nyn: Eikorero ry'amaaarwa erya Uganda Breweries nirimanya eibura ry'amaizi eririkukira kubaho obwire obu.
text.teo: Ejeni erionget loka aitolom imaten epone loikidiokoto kwana akipi.
text.eng: Uganda Breweries is mindful of the scarcity of water during this time.
text.ibo: Ndi na-emepụta mmanya na Uganda ma nke ọma, na mmiri di ụkọ n'oge ugbu a.
text.swa: Breweries ya Uganda ni ya kuzingatia uhaba wa maji wakati huu.

text.ach: Lakub kin dano ma I dul pa lucungu iwi bye ma kilwongo ni Alliance for National Transformation pe obiketo cinge I waraga me koko meno
text.lgg: Ba e'yo azi ngazani 'diyi otupi amuti Alliance for National Transformation niriari ngani dri ti e'yo o'bi yini asi ecezau ri ma dria ku
text.lug: Omukwanaganya wa Alliance for National Transformation tajja kuteeka mukono ku kiwandiiko.
text.nyn: Omuhikaanisa w'ekibiina ky'obutegyeki ekya Alliance for National Transformation taraate mukono aha kihandiiko.
text.teo: Mam acamanar naka Atukot Naka Aijulakin Kakwapuwoko ebuni aicikakin akan.
text.eng: The Alliance for National Transformation Coordinator will not have his signature on the petition.
text.ibo: Onyeisi nhazi mgbanwe nke mba ahụ, agaghị ebinye aka ya na-akwụkwọ arịrịọ ahụ.
text.swa: Mratibu wa Ushirikiano wa Kitaifa hautakuwa na saini yake kwenye ombi.

text.ach: Pwonye ni mukene otime ki yubu pii dolo maleng I Ggaba, Kampala
text.lgg: Embata nderi 'du pari pari yii edezu alaru Ggabaa Kampalaa ri ma alia
text.lug: Okutendekebwa kwabadde Ggaba ku ssengejjero ly'amazzi mu Kampala.
text.nyn: Okutendekwa kukakorerwa ahari Ggaba Treatment plant omuri Kampala.
text.teo: Abu aituutoorio kojaun Kaiboisit Naitolomere Akipi koGaba.
text.eng: The training took part at the Ggaba Water Treatment plant in Kampala.
text.ibo: Ozizi ihe ahụ bụ na Ggaba Water Treatment Plant dị na Kampala ka emere ya.
text.swa: Mafunzo hayo yalishiriki katika Kiwanda cha Matibabu cha Maji cha Ggaba huko Kampala.

text.ach: Opici ma kwedo bal ocoyo koko me bal
text.lgg: Enyati e'yo azita onyoza ni 'diyi ma vuti ondaapiri nzi buku e'yo ondaza ni ma ti ra
text.lug: Ekiwayi ekikola ku kunoonyereza emisango kiwandiise omusango
text.nyn: Ekitongore kya poriisi ekirikukurira okucondooza kibahandiikireho orubanja.
text.teo: Abu Atukot naka Abilak ikisila kipikakisi emusago.
text.eng: The Criminal Investigation Department filed a case.
text.ibo: Ndi ngalaba na-elekpu anya n'ihe gbasara mpụ, gbara akwụkwọ n'ụlọikpe.
text.swa: Idara ya uchunguzi wa uhalifu iliwasilisha kesi.

text.ach: Ludito tic ma gubedo kayabo nyonyo ma nongo  pii
text.lgg: Azi'ba e'yo okalamvu yii omvizani ma ti ziria 'diyi
text.lug: Abakungu bali ku mukolo gw'okuggulawo ekyuma ekikekkereza amazzi.
text.nyn: Abakozi aha runaku rw'okutongoza ekyoma ky'okucendeeza amaizi.
text.teo: Eswamak luka  etolomak acuma naka akipi.
text.eng: Officials at the launch of the water recovery plant.
text.ibo: Ndi isi, na mmeme mmalite ọrụ igwe, mgbake mmiri.
text.swa: Viongozi wakati wa uzinduzi wa mmea wa kufufua maji.

text.ach: Lobe me tung kunyango me del col ki tiyo ki cente madwong loyo I genge adwir loyo dul mukene I gamente
text.lgg: Kari Africa ma kala etuni efuria leru 'diyi aje ayu e'yo ageyitema niri ma dria aga esele azi gamete ni 'diyi ra
text.lug: Ensi za East Afirika zisaasaanya nnyo ku bukuumi okusinga ekintu ekirala kyonna.
text.nyn: Amahanga g'oburugwa-izooba bwa Afirica nigashohoza sente nyingi ahaby'okwerinda kukira ebindi bitongore bya gavumenti.
text.teo: Itosomaete akwapin nuko Kide naka African ikapun luipu toma ayuwara adepar toma orionget ediokere.
text.eng: East African countries spend more on defense than any other sector of government.
text.ibo:
Obodo ọwụwa anyanwụ Afrika na-emefu ego na nchekwa, karịa ngalaba ọrụ 
gọọmenti ndi ọzọ.

text.lgg: Ba dria emu eri ma aza ko drileonzi ni i 'yezurisi

text.nyn: Buriomwe ayijiire kumuyamba obu yabwiine obuvune.
text.teo: Apotu itunga kere kopotu aingarakin ngesi neatakanuna akangas.
text.eng: Everyone came to help him when the accident occurred.
text.ibo: Mmadụ nile bịara inyere ya aka oge ihe ọdachi ahụ mere.
text.swa: Kila mtu alikuja kumsaidia ajali ilipotokea.

text.ach: Wotwa obugik tin.
text.lgg: Ama vile aci ni i de andru.
text.lug: Olugendo lwaffe lukoma leero.
text.nyn: Orugyendo rweitu niruhwa erizooba .
text.teo: Engatakin lolo alositekosi.
text.eng: Our journey is ending today.
text.ibo: Njem anyị ga-abịa na njedebe taa.
text.swa: Safari yetu inaisha leo.

text.ach: Yoo ne obedo ma odiny tutwal.
text.lgg: Geri du ase be tre.
text.lug: Akakubo kaalimu ensiko nnyingi.
text.nyn: Omuhanda gukaba gwijwire ebinyatsi.
text.teo: Arai erot ngol loeswapit noi.
text.eng: The path was very bushy.
text.ibo: Ọhịa dị nnukwu na-ụzọ ahụ.
text.swa: Njia ilikuwa chafu sana.

text.ach: Dano mukene maro wilo mucele makipito dok kiyubu ki lobo ma woko.
text.lgg: Ba azi 'diyi le mucele 'bani ede engazu amveri je'i.
text.lug: Abantu abamu baagala kugula muceere guvudde mu nsi za bweru.
text.nyn: Abantu abamwe nibakuunda kugura omuceeri ogukoreirwe omu mahanga gaheeru.
text.teo: Eminasi icetunga agwel emuceri loitemonokinitai kotoma akwapin nuko kinga.
text.eng: Some people prefer to buy rice that was processed from outside countries.
text.ibo: Ụfọdọ ndi mmadu chọkarịrị ị na-azụ osikapa emepụtara na mba ọzọ.
text.swa: Baadhi ya watu wanapendelea kununua mchele uliosindikwa kutoka nchi za nje.

text.ach: Wic wil woko likwici I kom lucungu I yer pa ladit lobo mogo ingee yer.
text.lgg: Ba azi pa sopi ogua prisdentniria ma eyoni avi opeta ma vutia ra.
text.lug: Abamu ku abo abeesimbawo ku bwa pulezidenti beerabirirwa ddala oluvannyuma lw'okulonda.
text.nyn: Bamwe omu barikwesimba aha ntebe y'obwamukuru w'ihanga nibeebera kimwe byanyima y'akaruru.
text.teo: Ice luebwoete kwape lukapolok akwap imurokinio cut akaulo naka aseo.
text.eng: Some presidential candidates are completely forgotten after the elections.
text.ibo: Erosọọla ụfọdụ ndi dọrọ ndọrọndọrọ ochịchị onyeisi ala kemgbe emechara ntuli aka.
text.swa: Baadhi ya wagombea urais wamesahaulika kabisa baada ya uchaguzi.

text.ach: Tye ki biyacara mo madit tutwal.
text.lgg: Eri tujara azi amburuni ma e'i ni.
text.lug: Alina bizineesi nnene nnyo.
text.nyn: Ayiine  bizinesi mpaango munonga.
text.teo: Ejaasi ngesi keda ebiasara lokapolon noi.
text.eng: He owns a very large business.
text.ibo: O nwere nnukwute ụlọ ahịa.
text.swa: Ana biashara kubwa sana.

text.ach: En obalo kwer ma obedo tye.
text.lgg: So omu nde ma ale ci.
text.lug: Yagootaanya omukolo.
text.nyn: Akateganisa omukoro.
text.teo: Abu ngesi kitolitol epucit.
text.eng: He interrupted the ceremony.
text.ibo: O kwụsịrị mmeme ahụ.
text.swa: Alikatisha sherehe.

text.ach: Wod ker ne owoto kedwa me nyutiwa gang ker ne.
text.lgg: Karimva nde oji ama ivile angu ma ma kalasi kuru.
text.lug: Omulangira yatulambuzza olubiri lwe.
text.nyn: puriinsi akaturambuza ekikari kye.
text.teo: Abu okooke ekabaka koyanga sio aisirimor kotogo loka ekabaka.
text.eng: The prince took us around his castle.
text.ibo: Ọkpara eze kpọrọ anyị ga gburugburu nnukwu ụlọ ya.
text.swa: Mkuu alitupeleka kuzunguka ngome yake.

text.ach: Gin amata mene ma imaro loyo weng?
text.lgg: Afa mvuza mini le ndeniri ngoi?
text.lug: Kyakunywa ki ekisinga okukuwoomera?
text.nyn: Ekyokunywa eky'orikukunda ni kiiha?
text.teo: Inyoin bo imaten luimina jo aitelekarit kakere?
text.eng: What is your favorite drink?
text.ibo: Kedụ mmanya ị kachasị hụ n'anya?
text.swa: Ni kinywaji gani unachopenda zaidi?

text.ach: Kom ne pe obedo ma oromo pi dano ducu.
text.lgg: Kiti cani 'ba driasi ku.
text.lug: Entebe zaali tezimala.
text.nyn: Entebe zikaba zitarikumara bantu boona.
text.teo: Mam icolongo ngun edolete itunga kere.
text.eng: The seats were not enough for everyone.
text.ibo: Oche ahụ ezuteghị mmadụ nile.
text.swa: Viti havikutosha kila mtu.

text.ach: Bor piny me king gang mege ki mege tye rom mene?
text.lgg: Zoza eri vile akuri pima eselea mi vileri beri ngopi?
text.lug: Olugendo lwenkana wa okuva ewuwe okutuuka ewammwe.
text.nyn: Hariho rugyendo ki ahagati y'eka ye n'eyawe?
text.teo: Inyoin bo aojau naejai kiding ereke keda lokon?
text.eng: What is the distance between his home and yours?
text.ibo: Gịnị bụ ntoanya bido n'ụlọ ya rute na nke gị?
text.swa: Kuna umbali gani kati ya nyumba yake na yako?

text.ach: Wele makilwongo alwongo keken mabibino I kwer ne.
text.lgg: Ba omvele omve 'diyi lu nga emu omua nderia ni
text.lug: Abagenyi abayite bokka be basuubirwa okujja ku mukolo.
text.nyn: Abagyenyi abeesirwe bonka nibo barikuteekwateekwa kuza aha mukoro.
text.teo: Ipejok luenyaraunitai bon kesi ekotoi kojaikinos toma opucit.
text.eng: Only guests are expected to attend the ceremony.
text.ibo: Nanị ndi ọbịa ka-atụrụanya ịbịa mmeme a.
text.swa: Wageni pekee ndio wanaotarajiwa kuhudhuria sherehe hiyo.

text.ach: Pe aromo yee ni kombedi gitye lurem.
text.lgg: Ma econi a'i kini yi sawa 'disi agyiniri ku.
text.lug: Sisobola kukikkiriza nti kati bamukwano.
text.nyn: Tindikwikiriza ngu obwahati n'abanywani.
text.teo: Mam eong acamunit ebe eraasi kwana kesi ipaper.
text.eng: I cannot believe that they are now friends.
text.ibo: Enweghị m ike ikweta na ha bụ enyi ugbu a.
text.swa: Siwezi kuamini kwamba sasa ni marafiki.

text.ach: I kin jo aryo egoni, anga matye kanywaro lawote?
text.lgg: Eri 'diyi ma eselea, a'dini a'dini ole ni?
text.lug: Ku bombi ani abuzaabuza munne?’
text.nyn: Omuri babiri,nooha orikubeiha ondiijo?
text.teo: Kotoma itunga ngul iarei, ingai bo euta aboliar jo?
text.eng: Of the two, who is fooling who?’
text.ibo: Kedụ onye na-akwa ibe ya emo n'ime mmadụ abụọ?
text.swa: Kati ya hao wawili, nani anamdanganya mwingine?

text.ach: Abili myero oruk roc I cinggi ka gitye I kabedo ma bal otimme ie wek pe gubal caden matye.
text.lgg: Azi'ba ma osu afa dria 'diyi pari ezatani 'diyi ma alia ci yi kazu afa ecetaru 'diyi ezazu ku beni.
text.lug: Abasirikale basaanidde okwambala giraavu nga bali mu bifo awazzibwa omusango baleme okwonoona obujulizi.
text.nyn: Ba ofiisa bashemeriire kujwara giraavu aha myanya ekoreirwemu ebihagaro kwenda kutashisha buhame.
text.teo: Ibusakinit ipolisin ainap agilabs kotoma aiboisit naebilitere ekisl tetere mam kesi emunarete aitogogonget.
text.eng: Officers should wear gloves at crime scenes so that they do not spoil evidence.
text.ibo:
Ndi ọrụ uweoji kwesịrị ị na-eyi uwe aka ebe ọbụna emere mpụ, ka ha hapụ 
ịmebisi ihe ịgbaama.
text.swa: Maafisa wanapaswa kuvaa glavu kwenye matukio ya uhalifu ili wasiharibu ushahidi.

text.ach: Wabedo ki kacokke ki lakelwa jami me moko oo pa jami.
text.lgg: Afu dri 'ba afa ejipiri be afa yi ejizuri ma e'yo atizu
text.lug: Twakola olukungaana n'abatuwa ebintu okukakasa nti baabituwa.
text.nyn: Tukagira orukiiko nogwo orikutuha ebintu kuhamya okwija kw'abyo.
text.teo: Aponi sio ajaikinos keda airiamunet kanu aitogogong ayangaunio naka iboro.
text.eng: We held a meeting with the supplier to confirm the delivery.
text.ibo: Anyị na onye bu ngwaahịa a nwere nzukụ iji kpebie maka mbulata ya.
text.swa: Tulifanya mkutano na mtoa huduma ili kuthibitisha utoaji.

text.ach: Apwa tye madwong tutwal I gudu mapol pien piny lyet tutwal.
text.lgg: Irifura ga nzila pari yima dria tre a'disiku angu mile ma e'yosi
text.lug: Enguudo ezisinga obungi ziriko enfuufu olw'okuba omusana mungi.
text.nyn: Hariho omucuucu mwingi omu nguuto aha bw'omushana.
text.teo: Ejai apua orotin luipu naarai emwana akolong noi.
text.eng: There is a lot of dust on most roads because of the hot weather.
text.ibo: Izuzu juru ọtụtụ ụzọ maka ọkọchị a.
text.swa: Kuna vumbi nyingi kwenye barabara nyingi kwa sababu ya hali ya hewa ya joto.

text.ach: Omiyo lutic mege pwoc me kwero karama pi tic matek magutimo.
text.lgg: Fe 'ba azi'ba erini 'diyi dri atua Christmas niri yini azi ngale okposirisi.
text.lug: Yawa abakozi be akasiimo ka Ssekkukulu olw'okukola ennyo.
text.nyn: Akaheereza abakozi be enyongyeza za kurisimasi ahabw'okukora n'amaani.
text.teo: Abu ngesi koinak ikeswamak ikapun kanuka ebaga naarai eswamatos kesi kagogong.
text.eng: He gave his employees Christmas bonuses for their hard work.
text.ibo: O nyere ndi na-arụrụ ya ọrụ, ego ekeresimesi maka irụsi ọrụ ha ike.
text.swa: Aliwapa wafanyakazi wake bonasi za Krismasi kwa bidii yao.

text.ach: Gamente oketo cente me tero mac elektriciti I kabedo me caro.
text.lgg: Gomete fe robia aci oseza 'diyi idrizu pari calu ri 'diyi ma alia ra
text.lug: Gavumenti etaddewo ssente ez'okutuusa amasanyalaze mu bitundu eby'omu byalo.
text.nyn: Gavumenti etaireho sente z'okutwara amashanyarazi omu byaro.
text.teo: Itemokinit apugan ikapun kanu ayangar akim naka epiyei toma aiboisio nuka icaloi.
text.eng: The government has allocated funds to extend electricity to rural areas.
text.ibo: Gọọmenti ekepụtala ego maka ime ka ọkụ letriki rutegasịa ime obodo.
text.swa: Serikali imetenga fedha za kusambaza umeme vijijini.

text.ach: Wel cente me cango two kanca tek tutwal.
text.lgg: Azo cancer niri ma atita ajeru
text.lug: Kyetaagisa ssente nnyingi nnyo okujjanjaba ekirwadde kya kookolo.
text.nyn: Okujanjaba erwara ya kokoro nikitwara senti nyingi.
text.teo: Epol etiai loka amukian ekansa.
text.eng: Cancer treatment is expensive.
text.ibo: Ọgwụgwọ oria kansa dị oke ọnụ.
text.swa: Matibabu ya saratani ni ghali.

text.ach: Ot lum pa jairano omol ki pii ma opong.
text.lgg: Yi tizari e'bi jo ejele vile jo nguluari oji de teketeke 'duzu ra
text.lug: Akasiisira ka muliraanwa konna kaakulukusibwa amataba.
text.nyn: Akafuuha ka muriranwa waitu koona katwirwe omutunga.
text.teo: Abu ebulone kotia etogo loka eidunyeteka.
text.eng: The neighbor's hut had been completely washed away by the flood.
text.ibo: Ide mmiri buchapụla ụlọ onye agbataobi, kpamkpam.
text.swa: Kibanda cha jirani kilikuwa kimesombwa na maji kabisa.

text.ach: Kabedo ne ngwece tye kaduny marac tutwal pien paipo me wot pa coron omwoc odiko matin.
text.lgg: Angu nderi ni nguu a'disikuni payibu azakoza ni razuri afi obitirosi ni
text.lug: Ekifo kikyuuma kubanga omuddumu gwa kazambi gwayabise ku makya leero.
text.nyn: Omwanya nigunuka kubi ahabwokuba erupiira rw'oburofa rwashandaara omu kasheshe eraizooba.
text.teo: Ebos aiboisit ngin naarai abu apaipo naka akipi nuecoloni kobwanga atupuruc na.
text.eng: The area stinks because a sewage pipe burst this morning.
text.ibo: Ebe a na-esi isi maka ụzọ nsi, gbawara na-ụtụtụ a.
text.swa: Eneo hilo linanuka kwa sababu bomba la maji taka lilipasuka leo asubuhi.

text.ach: Kingolo pol yadi me kabedo ne me baro bao.
text.lgg: Ba oga pati angu nde ma alia 'diyi ma pari bawu fazu
text.lug: Emiti egisinga obungi mu kitundu ekyo gyatemebwa okusobola okufunamu embaawo.
text.nyn: Emiti emingi bagitemire kukora embaho.
text.teo: Etubitubitai ikito luipu luka aiboisit kangin kanuka abawoi.
text.eng: Most of the trees in the area have been cut down for timber.
text.ibo: E gbutuela ọtụtụ osisi nọ na-ebe ahụ, maka iji mere osisi ịrụ ụlọ.
text.swa: Miti mingi katika eneo hilo imekatwa kwa ajili ya mbao.

text.ach: Dako mega orido ni myero wawil ngom me gedo ot mamegwa.
text.lgg: Ma okuni le kini ama ma je angu lizani jo amani ama ngulupisi ni sizu
text.lug: Mukyala wange yampaliriza okugula poloti tuzimbemu ennyumba eyaffe ku bwaffe.
text.nyn: Omukazi wangye akanshaba tugure itaka twombeke enju eyaitu.
text.teo: Abu akaberu kotema ebe ibusakinit sio agwelun epuloti loka alupok kasodete adukokin etogokosi.
text.eng: My wife demanded that we buy a plot of land to build our own house.
text.ibo: Nwunyem chọrọ ka anyị zụọ ala were wuo ụlọ nke anyị
text.swa: Mke wangu alidai kwamba tununue kiwanja ili kujenga nyumba yetu wenyewe.

text.ach: En owilo macungwa ki muyeme.
text.lgg: Je ndima piyi mengu pie
text.lug: Yagula emiyembe n'emikyungwa.
text.nyn: Akagura emichungwa n'emiyembe.
text.teo: Abu ngesi kogwel imucugai keda imweben.
text.eng: She bought oranges and mangoes.
text.ibo: Ọ zụtara oroma na mangoro
text.swa: Alinunua machungwa na maembe.

text.ach: Lacung pi ladit lobo I dicitrwik tye ka pwonyo dano I kom kite magiromo gwokke kwede I kom kwidi korona.
text.lgg: Ba e'yo ma dri cepi distrikit si Commissioner ruri ni 'ba angu ma alia 'diyi emba geri yini ecozu yi ma ta mbazu o'bu nde vurisi
text.lug: Omukungu akulira disitulikiti ayigiriza abantu b'omu kitundu engeri y'okwekuumamu ekirwadde.
text.nyn: Omujwekyerwa wa disituriki ariyo nashomesa abaturagye oku bashemeraire kwerinda akakooko.
text.teo: Euta ekomisiona loka edisitrikta aisisianakin itunga epone loka ayuwara kama ejai ekorona.
text.eng: The district commissioner is teaching the locals how to protect themselves from the virus.
text.ibo:
Kọmishọna mpaghara a na-akụziri ndi obodo otu ha ga-esi chebe 
onwe ha na-ebe nje a nọ.
text.swa: Mkuu wa wilaya akiwafundisha wenyeji jinsi ya kujikinga na virusi.

text.ach: Dano mogo orwenyo ticgi dong pe giromo gwoko gangigi.
text.lgg: Ba azi 'diyi avi azi yini ra azini econi afa fe familia yini 'diyi dri ku
text.lug: Abantu abamu baafiirwa emirimu gyabwe era tebasobola kulabirira ba mu maka gaabwe.
text.nyn: Abantu abamwe bakafeerwa emirimo yaabo tibakabaasa kureberera amaka gaabo.
text.teo: Apotu icetunga kotwakiasi aswamisineikec ido mam epedoritos aigang lukokalekec.
text.eng: Some people lost their jobs and cannot provide for their families.
text.ibo: A kwụsịrị ụfọdụ ndi n'ọrụ, ha enweghịkwa ike ileta ezinụlọ ha anya.
text.swa: Watu wengine walipoteza kazi zao na hawawezi kutunza familia zao.

text.ach: Lucung iwi bye mogo tamo pi miti mameggi gigi.
text.lgg: Ba politiki ni azi 'diyi fi yi e'yo yi ma ngulupi ni 'diyi si
text.lug: Bannabyabufuzi abamu bakiikirira byabwe ku bwabwe.
text.nyn: Ab'ebyobutegyeki abamwe nibafa aha nshonga zaabo tibakufa aha nshonga z'abantu.
text.teo: Icepolitisans ebwoikinitos ipudesia luka itunga.
text.eng: Some politicians represent personal interests.
text.ibo: Ụfọdụ ndi ndọrọndọrọ n'achọ nanị ọdị nma ha.
text.swa: Baadhi ya wanasiasa wanawakilisha maslahi binafsi.

text.ach: Dul mapat-pat me cim otiko dwoko kubbe i lok yot tutwal I lobo ne.
text.lgg: Amuti simu ni 'diyi fe e'yo o'duko eceza ni kari ma aliasi 'diyi 'bazu ewakokoru
text.lug: Kampuni z'amasimu zigonzezza nnyo eby'empuliziganya mu ggwanga.
text.nyn: Kampuni z'ebyokuhurizingana zitaireho okorobya omu by'okuhurizingana omw'eihanga ryona.
text.teo: Etapatanata ikampunin luka isimun epone loka einer kotoma akwap.
text.eng: Telecom companies have simplified communication across the country.
text.ibo:
Ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka iji ekwenta zisa ozi, emela ka nkwukọrịta okwu dị nfe 
na obodo.
text.swa: Kampuni za mawasiliano zimerahisisha mawasiliano kote nchini.

text.ach: Lutino nongo lurem i yoo me tuku I kingi.
text.lgg: Anzi nyiri yi agyi 'ba geri ovuzu yi ma eselearisi
text.lug: Abaana bakola emikwano bwe babeera n'abalala.
text.nyn: Abaana nibakora amanywani baaba nigaita naabo.
text.teo: Edumununete idwe ipaper kotoma aupanena.
text.eng: Children make friends through socializing.
text.ibo: Ụmụaka na-enweta ndi enyi sita na nnọkọrịta.
text.swa: Watoto hufanya marafiki kwa kushirikiana.

text.ach: Dano mapol pe romo nongo kony makwako cik pien limgi nok.
text.lgg: Ba karakara econi azi feza e'yo azitani 'diyi niri isu ku a'disikuni robia ni ovuzu wererisi
text.lug: Abantu bangi tebasobola kuyambibwa mu mateeka olw'okuba baba tebalina ssente.
text.nyn: Abantu baingi tibakutunga obuheereza omu by'amateeka ahabw'okuba tibaine esente.
text.teo: Mam itunga luipu epedoritos adumunun ejaanakine loka apugan naarai ikidioko kesi ikapun.
text.eng: Many people cannot access legal services because of limited finances.
text.ibo: Ọtụtụ ndi mmadụ enweghị ike ịnweta ndi ọrụ iwu n'ihi enweghị ego.
text.swa: Watu wengi hawawezi kupata huduma za kisheria kwa sababu ya uhaba wa fedha.

text.ach: Atye kalek onyo tye ka timme ada?
text.lgg: Orobi ni 'di ma obii niya kani 'di e'yo adani?
text.lug: Ndoota buloosi oba kituufu?
text.nyn: Ndiyo nindoota ninga mamazima?
text.teo: Auta kereka eong airuja arai bo erai abeit?
text.eng: Am I dreaming or it is real?
text.ibo: Ana m arọ nrọ, ka ihe a ọ bụ n'ihe?
text.swa: Ninaota au ni kweli?

text.ach: Pe iwek kombedi.
text.lgg: Eku sawa 'disi ku
text.lug: Togenda kati.
text.nyn: Otakagyenda eshaha ezi.
text.teo: Sirikinyou kwape kwana.
text.eng: Don’t leave right now.
text.ibo: Alakwala ugbu a.
text.swa: Usiondoke sasa hivi.

text.ach: Tin tekci obedo nok tutwal.
text.lgg: Taxi yi andru ndazaru
text.lug: Takisi zibadde ntono leero.
text.nyn: Taxi zaaba ziri nkye.
text.teo: Ikidioko lolo itakisin.
text.eng: The taxis were scarce today.
text.ibo: Tagịzị ndi a dị ụkọ taa.
text.swa: Teksi zilikuwa chache leo.

text.ach: Pingo ma imaro lego cente I kare ducu.
text.lgg: Mi mini sende ozi sawa driasi a'disi?
text.lug: Lwaki otera okusaba ssente buli kiseera?
text.nyn: Ahabwenki orikushaba esente burizooba?
text.teo: Kanukinyo ilipenena jo ikapun kangolisawa?
text.eng: Why do you always ask for money every time?
text.ibo: Gịnị kpatara iji achọ ego mgbe ọbụla?
text.swa: Kwa nini kila wakati unaomba pesa?

text.ach: Ot yat ne openyo ciling milyon abic ka wek gitii I kom latwo ne.
text.lgg: Arojo a'i silingi milioni towi azi ngazi 'ba azoruri ma rua
text.lug: Eddwaliro lisabye obukadde butaano obw'ensimbe za Uganda okusobola okukola ku mulwadde.
text.nyn: Erwariro ryashab miriyooni itaano za Uganda kujanjaba omurwire.
text.teo: Ekoto adekis imilioni ikany kanu aimuke adekak ngun.
text.eng: The hospital has asked for five million Uganda Shillings to work on the patient.
text.ibo:
Ndi ụlọ ọgwụ chọrọ ọnụ ego nde ise nke Shilings ndi Uganda 
iji malite ọgwụgwọ onye ọrịa a.
